Line1.B2A1E: May you forever be shunned by the Light.
Line3.B2A1E: Like rabid mongrels, you will turn on your masters and all around you.
Line5.B2A1E: May your righteous hunger consume you for all eternity.
Line7.B2A1E: May the darkness in your heart spread like blood from an open wound amongst your kin until you are surrounded by that which you find most vile.
